name: Kamakhya Temple
desc: A major Shakti Peeth in Guwahati, Assam, dedicated to Goddess Kamakhya.

name: Kalighat Kali Temple
desc: A prominent Shakti Peeth in Kolkata, West Bengal, dedicated to Goddess Kali.

name: Vaishno Devi Temple
desc: A revered Shakti Peeth in Katra, Jammu and Kashmir, dedicated to Goddess Vaishno Devi.

name: Jwalamukhi Temple
desc: A Shakti Peeth in Himachal Pradesh, known for its eternal flames, dedicated to Goddess Jwalamukhi.

name: Ambaji Temple
desc: A Shakti Peeth in Gujarat, dedicated to Goddess Amba.

name: Attukal Bhagavathy Temple
desc: A Shakti Peeth in Thiruvananthapuram, Kerala, dedicated to Goddess Bhagavathy.

name: Naina Devi Temple
desc: A Shakti Peeth in Madhya Pradesh, dedicated to Goddess Naina Devi.

name: Kedarnath Temple
desc: A sacred Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Shiva, located in the Himalayas, representing the Sky element.

name: Kaleshwara Mukteeshwara Swamy Temple
desc: A Shiva temple in Telangana, part of the Shiva Shakti Aksh Rekha alignment.

name: Srikalahasti Temple
desc: A Shiva temple in Andhra Pradesh, representing the Air element in the Pancha Bhoota.

name: Ekambareswarar Temple
desc: A Shiva temple in Kanchipuram, Tamil Nadu, representing the Earth element in the Pancha Bhoota.

name: Jambukeswara Temple
desc: A Shiva temple in Thiruvanaikaval, Tamil Nadu, representing the Water element in the Pancha Bhoota.

name: Annamalaiyar Temple
desc: A Shiva temple in Thiruvannamalai, Tamil Nadu, representing the Fire element in the Pancha Bhoota.

name: Nataraja Temple
desc: A Shiva temple in Chidambaram, Tamil Nadu, representing the Space element in the Pancha Bhoota.

name: Ramanathaswamy Temple
desc: A sacred Hindu temple in Rameswaram, Tamil Nadu, dedicated to Lord Shiva, also part of the Char Dham.

name: Amarnath Temple
desc: A sacred cave temple in the Himalayas, dedicated to Lord Shiva, known for the natural ice lingam.

name: Somnath Temple
desc: A sacred Jyotirlinga temple in Gujarat, dedicated to Lord Shiva.

name: Kashi Vishwanath Temple
desc: A sacred Jyotirlinga temple in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, dedicated to Lord Shiva.

name: Badrinath Temple
desc: A holy Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Vishnu, located in the Garhwal Himalayas, part of the Char Dham pilgrimage.

name: Jagannath Temple
desc: A famous Hindu temple dedicated to Lord Jagannath, located in Puri, Odisha, known for the annual Rath Yatra festival.

name: Dwarkadhish Temple
desc: A sacred temple dedicated to Lord Krishna, located in Dwarka, Gujarat, part of the Char Dham pilgrimage.

name: Tirupati Balaji Temple
desc: A famous temple dedicated to Lord Venkateswara, an incarnation of Vishnu, in Tirupati, Andhra Pradesh.

name: Ranganathaswamy Temple
desc: A major Vishnu temple in Srirangam, Tamil Nadu, known for its Dravidian architecture.

name: Hanuman Mandir, Connaught Place
desc: A famous Hanuman temple in Connaught Place, New Delhi, known for its ancient history.

name: Hanuman Garhi, Ayodhya
desc: A significant Hanuman temple in Ayodhya, Uttar Pradesh, located near the Ram Janmabhoomi.

name: Sankat Mochan Hanuman Temple
desc: A revered Hanuman temple in Varanasi, Uttar Pradesh, known for its spiritual significance.

name: Siddhivinayak Temple
desc: A famous Ganesha temple in Mumbai, Maharashtra, known for its spiritual significance.

name: Shree Ganesh Temple, Ranthambore
desc: A revered Ganesha temple in Ranthambore, Rajasthan, known for the Trinetra Ganesha idol.

name: Dagadusheth Halwai Ganapati Temple
desc: A famous Ganesha temple in Pune, Maharashtra, known for its grand celebrations during Ganesh Chaturthi.

name: Konark Sun Temple
desc: A 13th-century CE Sun Temple at Konark, Odisha, known for its stunning architecture.
